meanings.sent1: The bodyboarders rode the waves at the beach.
meanings.sent2: Many bodyboarders enjoy spending time in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The bodyboarders had a friendly competition to see who could catch the biggest wave.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of bodyboarders, she stood out with her colorful board.
meanings.sent5: The group of bodyboarders laughed and cheered as they rode the waves together.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the sport of bodyboarding.
meanings.sent1: We watched the bodyboarders glide effortlessly on the water.
meanings.sent2: The beach was filled with bodyboarders of all ages.
meanings.sent3: The bodyboarders organized a beach cleanup to give back to the community.
meanings.sent4: Among the bodyboarders, he was known for his impressive tricks.
meanings.sent5: The bodyboarders' passion for the sport was evident in their dedication to practice.
